name: Circa50:CompactII
subtitle: Litter Hideaway & Pet House
description: The Circa50 Modular Collection is modeled with Mid-Century design principals; styled yet simple, with utility and durability in mind. These cabinets can stand alone, stack or sit side-by-side in endless configurations to disguise unsightly litter pans, reduce litter tracking or be used as a place for your modern cat or dog to play, perch or sleep while fitting into your home's modern style.

details.title: Features
content: Holes on either side allow for ventilation and easy moving
Handcrafted with 3/4" Walnut Hardwood veneer Euro Ply
Optional removable 1" foam cushion in your choice of fabric
Optional removable 2" foam bed with washable fleece cover

details.title: Shipping
content: Items ship free, fully assembled (Continental US only)
For international shipping rates, please contact me for a quote

pinitcaption: Circa50:CompactII, Litter Hideaway and Pet House
